wallet.paragraph: All wallets covered by $100m Lloyd‚Äôs Insurance. Annual 3rd party security audits are done to make sure all funds are safe in our hands.

words.paragraph1: Greenpro Capital Corp. Signs Letter of Intent to Acquire 18% in First Bullion Inc. - 'With the Cryptosx Digital Assets Exchange from First Bullion, supported by the new generation regulated crypto investment bank, we could have a significant synergistic effect together with ADAQ. We strongly believe the partnership will create values for our investors and other stakeholders.'
words.paragraph2: 'Cryptosx Digital Assets Exchange is an example entity that has a CEZA OVCE license.Cryptosx uses blockchain or distributed ledger technology to digitize assets. The digitized assets are then packaged into smart contracts that rapidly get deployed across jurisdictions and markets. Additionally, it uses blockchain for anti-money laundering and KYC (know-your-customer) authentications before potential investors can access the DATOs.'
words.paragraph3: 'FLOURISH CITY DEVELOPMENT LIMITED (‚ÄúFCD‚Äù) today announces that AGWD is the first asset-backed token approved by Cagayan Economic Zone Authority (‚ÄúCEZA‚Äù) and Asia Blockchain and Crypto Association (‚ÄúABACA‚Äù) under CEZA‚Äôs Digital Asset Token Offering (‚ÄúDATO‚Äù) Rules. The AGWD tokens will be offered to accredited investors and will be traded on Cryptosx Digital Assets Exchange (‚ÄúCryptosx‚Äù) licensed by CEZA.'

process.subTitle: Start trading digital asset tokens in 4 simple steps.

trading.title: Faster, Simpler Trading
trading.subTitle1: Traditional settlement of alternative assets can take over 4 weeks to process. Our technology streamlines those manual processes on the backend, settling most trades within minutes.
trading.subTitle2: That means less market friction and more accessible capital.

process.title: Security Token Launch Process
process.subTitle: Issue your security token under CEZA's Digital Asset Token Offering (DATO) framework
process.step1b: Schedule a call with us to help us get an understanding of your company
process.step2b: Prepare required documents such as: Audit report, valuation report and offering memorandum for CEZA‚Äôs regulatory review
process.step3b: Once the project has been approved, we will create the security token and list it onto our security token exchange - Investor Portal

features1.title: Fundraise with a proven Regulatory Framework
features1.subTitle: Offering fully regulated STO under CEZA and ABACA's Digital Asset Token Offering (DATO) framework from sponsoring to the offering. We make it easy for you to launch digital security.
features1.li1: 3+ Successful STO projects approved and launched with us
features1.li2: Automated compliance with a proven regulatory framework

features2.title: Cost Reduction and Saving Benefits
features2.subTitle: Listing your company on a stock exchange via an IPO could be a time consuming and costly process. With an STO, your company can enjoy:
features2.li1: Reduced legal, valuation, auditing time and costs
features2.li2: Suitable for projects looking to raise under $10m

hero.title: Tokenize
hero.subTitle: Tokenized assets transform the capital formation process by automating costly compliance requirements through a transparent & immutable ledger

benefits.step1b: Tokenized assets enable previously illiquid assets to become more liquid
benefits.step2b: Tokenized assets often enjoy reduced listing, legal, valuation and auditing fees
benefits.step3b: Transfer of ownership can often be settled within minutes

features1.title: Fundraise with our Tokenization Technology
features1.subTitle: Proven Security Token templates streamline the process of capital raising to allow faster time to market. Built-in programmatic ownership restrictions, you can sell private securities to a global pool of investors while allowing a liquid secondary market to develop.
features1.li1: All token templates verified by third-party security experts

features2.title: Effortless Token lifecycle Management
features2.subTitle: From token creation to the management of investor relations, we provide a one-stop solution for your company to continuously manage its tokens throughout the lifecycle.
features2.li1: Continuous cap table management and reporting

features3.title: Interact with your Security Token in Real-time
features3.subTitle: Our Issuance Platform interface grants issuers and transfer agents the power to interact with smart contracts in real-time. This ensures token ownerships and transfers will be compliant. All done on the blockchain level, interaction includes:
features3.li3: Pause or resume all token transactions

aboutCryptosx.title: About Cryptosx
aboutCryptosx.para1: Headquartered in Makati, the Philippines and with offices in Manila and Hong Kong. Cryptosx‚Ñ¢ is a financial services company providing Digital Assets exchange services as Asia-focused alternative to the world‚Äôs dominant bitcoin exchanges (Binance, Bitfinex etc..)
aboutCryptosx.para2: Our investors include the top tier investors and financial technology companies from Wall Street, including: Greenpro Capital Corp. (NASDAQ:GRNQ), Alphapoint Inc. and more.

services.title: Our Services
services.para1: Cryptosx allows¬†trading¬†between¬†USD¬†currency¬†and¬†bitcoin¬†cryptocurrency. It allows¬†USD,¬†EUR,¬†bitcoin,¬†ethereum, tether, litecoin, XRP, or¬†bitcoin cash¬†deposits¬†and withdrawals.
services.para2: Our users can buy or sell Virtual Assets and Digital Assets from or to other Members in exchange for other Virtual Assets or Digital Assets, or for fiat currency;
services.li1: Enter into arrangements to store Virtual Assets and Digital Assets listed on the Site with a third-party custodian;
services.li2: Withdraw any fiat currency balance held in your Account;
services.li3: Transfer Virtual Assets and Digital Assets to a wallet or to other users of such Virtual Assets and Digital Assets outside the Site; and
services.li4: Use Virtual Assets for purchasing goods;

story.title: Our Story
story.para1: In 2017, our founders saw the growing trend and market demand for digital finance. With its mission to deliver trust in digital assets, they have founded our mother company - First Bullion Holdings INC, a financial services investment company.
story.para2: In 2018, we became the Principal Licensee authorized by the Cagayan Special Economic Zone and Freeport, the Philippines to conduct Financial Technology Solutions and Offshore Virtual Currency Exchange ('FTSOVC') business activities, including the authority to approve and endorse security token offerings, operation of digital assets exchanges as well as the provision of digital assets wealth management services.
story.para3: In 2019, we completed the Flourish City Development Limited (FCD) STO within 3 months, the first asset-backed token offering approved by CEZA.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.para: Our mission is to deliver trust in digital assets and make it more accessible. For institutional investors to participate in digital asset market, they need services and solutions they can trust. Cryptosx eliminates risk and increases transparency in the digital asset markets by providing the most secure and compliant custodial, liquidity and exchange solutions.
